articles.title: Parliament Cigarette Row: Trinamool MP defends smoking, Blames BJP Instead
articles.description: ​​​​​​​Trinamool Congress MP Saugata Roy has triggered a political storm after being filmed smoking at the Makar Dwar entrance of the Parliament complex. Union ministers Gajendra Singh Shekhawat and Giriraj Singh confronted him on the spot, accusing him of flouting public-health rules. Roy brushed o

articles.title: Shivraj Patil: The minister accused of preferring vanity over duty
articles.description: Shivraj Patil faced criticism for security lapses during attacks like the 2006 Malegaon blasts and the 26/11 Mumbai attacks. However, what came under media scrutiny was his frequent wardrobe changes amid the crises.

articles.title: Majawadi: BJP Takes Jibe At Siddaramaiah Over Rs 47 Crore Helicopter Bill
articles.description: ​​​​​​​This report digs into the Karnataka government's mounting trouble over Chief Minister Siddaramaiah's air-travel bill. Newly disclosed records show the administration spent more than Rs 47 crore on 180 helicopter and special-aircraft trips between May 2023 and November 2025. India Today's Saga
